attributes.action: Allow a national ballot on the implementation of  Danish style immigration.
attributes.additional_details:
To allow the policy to be put to the people of the United Kingdom in the form of a national ballot.
This policy is of such importance to the nation that government alone cannot make the decision to implement it or not.
attributes.background: Allow a national ballot to implement a Danish style immigration policy as outlined in a recent BBC article detailing the possible adoption of measures by the Home Secretary Shabana Mahmood.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition setting out more clearly what measures would be included in such an immigration policy, and on which you would like there to be votes.
